item.description:
Come Join NHCer Emily at Black Bear in New Haven for Karaoke!

Emily has won a happy hour from Black Bear Saloon and would like to share it with the group prior to Karaoke.  $2 Beer and Well drinks will be available from 7-9 to up to 16 people that join Emily.

Singing is not mandatory to attend, but I know some are looking forward to it.

According to Black Bears website, the actualy Karaoke starts at 9, so you have pleanty of time to gain some courage (liquid or otherwise) by meeting up at 7.

After the $2 happy hour ends, you can enjoy Black Bears normal Karaoke night specials... which acording to thier website... "Every Wednesday night we are giving away $50 CASH to the best singer of the night, so be sure to get down here and show us what those pipes are made of! We have $3 Pints 7-close and $4.99 APPETIZERS until 10pm! On top of all that, you'll receive 1/2 off your food bill just for signing up for karaoke!!!"  (NOTE: websites have been wrong before, so I recommend confirming those parts of the deal when you get there.)

Look for Emily, whom can be reached at 203-812-9243.  She will add details as necissary as the day approaches.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Emily. She can be reached at 203-812-9243.
item.name: Karaoke and $2 Drinks Happy Hour.
